text: Amazing deal, customer service and installation. I highly recommend!

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Ernie Smith
text: Dominique was great help and her suggestions led to a stellar kitchen remodel! Now on to the bathroom....

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Airton De Paula
text: Island Granite has the best installer and sales rep in town!!! Dominique will help you from beginning to end!!!

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Steve Jones
text: Great group to work with. Highly recommend anyone needing counter tops.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Steve Jones, we're extremely happy with your review! Thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Tina Bearfield
text: Tabitha is great. She was so helpful and knowlegible about the products.

resp.text: Hey Tina, Thank you for the awesome review. We greatly appreciate it.

name: Chris M
text:
Dominique was great.
Very knowledgeable and informative!!

name: Courier Gaming “Koolest Man Ever”
text: Amazing customer service by Tabitha. Would recommend Island Granite.

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: Ali Roe
text: I would highly recommend Island Granite to everyone!! My sales girl Chelsie was an absolute dream to work with!!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: Shane Zimmerman
text: Excellent group! Dominique is a joy to work with.

name: Amy Younce
text: Great experience, Chelsie was very helpful and the installation was a breeze.

name: clay conrad
text: Great company,with the best people,Ask for Chelsey for the best service available.

resp.text: Clay,  thank you so much for taking the time to leave this excellent review.  We really appreciate your business.  Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

name: Terry Mikloucich
text: Very pleased with service and work quality!

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Terry!

name: Isabel Espinheira
text:
Great service!
Dominique was great!

resp.text: Hi Isabel, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review.  We're glad that you enjoyed your experience with !

name: Analise Navia
text: Dominque was professional and friendly. The product, price and efficiency an exceptional!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: Silvio Souza
text: Great services. Dominique is always very knowledgeable and helpful.

name: Michael Jinks
text: Glad we went with Island Cranite. Great service , wonderful product  Installers were great and  did wonderful job

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Jinks! We really appreciate your review.

name: Stacey Ryals
text: Chelsie is the ONE.   5 star service.

resp.text: We’re so glad you had a good experience.

name: Adam Anderson
text: Tabitha rocks! She’s the best

resp.text: Adam, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us. So thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Jacob Knighton (J)
text: Tabitha was great!

name: lOUIS STRONG
text: Sharing my experience with Clark Memorials.  Our salesman was terrific. He was older.  He told me from the start that it was going to take some time because of Covid. It took about 13 weeks to get my mother's head stone and was worth the wait!  My family and I are very pleased.  Thank You Clark Memorials!!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review!

name: Marie
text: I wouldn't recommend this company at all. They don't care about the customers and the grief we are going through. I called four times before I finally talked to someone about adding the death date for my mom and they said I would be notified when it was completed...never notified. If I hadn't went to the cemetery I wouldn't have know it was completed. That's horrible for a business to lie and rather heartless knowing a loved one is waiting on an update about the completion of something that's important for a lost loved one and you've paid for it too. Unacceptable.

resp.text:
Hello, I hated to read the review you wrote about Clark Memorials. We strive very hard to treat each customer as if they were family. We did not notify you because during the time the engraving was done, our offices were closed because of Covid 19.
Our offices closed 2 days after you placed your order.  We were closed for about 45 days.
Our sandblaster took it upon himself to add the date to your mother's headstone since that was something he could in the cemetery during the time our offices were closed even though he was not required to do so until we reopened. Upon re-opening, we learned that 3 date of passing had been added to monuments.  Again, I am very sorry you feel the way you do.

name: TW Hutchens
text: My experience with Clark Memorials was excellent!!!  From start to finish!!!

name: L Watters
text:
Why can’t I give no stars!
Never again will I use this company. I’d rather learn to make my own marker than use them. They have the type of bad customer service that has you ordering from Walmart and Amazon instead of supporting local businesses.

name: Lucretia Sumerel
text: Friendly owner really helpful. Not pushy at all.

name: Melinda McWaters
text:
Done a Beautiful job on my Parents head stone just Beautiful it’s at least 10 Stars ⭐️!!!
Thanks so much Mr. Chase.

name: Meghan
text: Family owned and great people. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.

name: LaKisha knight
text: Words cannot express how disappointed I am. I was reassured several times over several months that my mother’s headstone would be delivered and placed before Mother’s Day. Even up to 3 days before, they lied and told me they were placing the headstone down. Needless to say, it didn’t happen. I was saddened that I wouldn’t get the closure of giving my mother her “last” gift for Mother’s Day. And all Clark Memorials said was “we’re sorry”. Unprofessional and unacceptable!!

name: Barbara Stephens
text: Courteous, responsible,  compassionate, good communication, excellent work.

name: Gina Huie
text: Well established business here in Birmingham. Pleasant employees and very knowledgeable.

name: . Harris
text: The place to go. They will take care of you and handle the situation. That's why they have been in business for over 60 yrs...

name: Angela Regulus
text: Don't be in a hurry for service. Order a year in advance

name: Alabama Lucey
text: We have done business here before and once again the employees were OUTSTANDING!  They even took us in the back to show us their kitchen flooring so we could have a better feel for what it would look like   Another place you have got to at least check out if you're in the market for flooring.  But they have other items also like tile for backsplashes.

name: Jordan Smith
text: Blake was amazing! I wasn’t having much luck getting ANY responses (email, phone, etc) from other local flooring stores but Blake kept in touch and worked with us on getting us the BEST price and made the process SO easy!!!!! Will recommend to everyone I know, & be using them for all future needs!

name: Tracy Sedlack
text: Needed a quick install to sell a house. Customer service was outstanding. Jim worked with me and helped find me a great deal on new flooring. Installed two days later and looks great. Can't thank Jim and the installers enough for the great service and help picking a great looking carpet for the whole house.

name: Ashley Carson
text: Most definitely a one stop shop!!! I am so very happy we chose American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to take care of all our needs in building our new home. My husband an I finally built our dream house this year;  we were treated like family from all the staff and installers from start to finish.  We did LVP flooring throughout it is absolutely gorgeous. They helped us pick out the perfect tile and accent pieces for our walk-in shower. The solid wood cabinets were just fantastic they went perfect with the quartzite we chose for the kitchen an master bath, it makes my heart beat fast, it's so beautiful. They have a large selection from all over he world, slabs I have never seen before anywhere.                                        I want to thank everyone there for making our experience a little less painful, anytime you build a house things come up and we were very pleased how they worked with us on our scheduling.  I highly recommend American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to all my family and friends. We are so very happy!!!!

name: Melanie Lobel
text: First visit to American Carpet and had the best experience picking out carpet. Johnny Marino was such a professional and assisted me with making great selections at a terrific price. They were able to meet my installation requirements immediately. The quality and service was so remarkable that I went back 2 days later and purchased gorgeous marble for my fireplace surround. What a pleasure doing business with American Carpet and Flooring. Definitely ask for Johnny. Great guy.

name: Tazman Reid.
text:
The sales lady was fantastic, she pretty much took care of everything over the phone, I went to the store and was out of there in 10 min.
A 10 for Marisa !

name: Gerald Drakeford
text:
Mr. Don Williams always has a warm smile and greeting each time we visit the store. Johnny facilitated our flooring and granite orders and was great to work with as well!

We had hardwood floors as well as granite countertops installed.  Glynn and his crew did a great job on the flooring. They were on time each day and were very attentive to details during the installation.

Likewise, the guys that installed our granite countertops were top shelf as well, detail oriented, and very professional.

Would definitely recommend American Carpets and Flooring!

name: Kishina Brown
text: I was looking for purchasing new flooring for the rest of my house. I walked in with a large piece of carpet in hand to see what would look good with my new carpet. As I entered I was not greeted. I noticed three men in a corner talking and I walked close by and again never greeted. So I will not ever step foot in this store again.

name: James Sessions
text: My wife and I decided to totally remodel our master bathroom which was a big deal for us.  After making visits to several stores and getting conflicting advice on what we could and should not do. We were so confused but knew how we wanted the new bathroom to look.   I suggested that we stop by American Flooring which we decided to be the last stop before leaving Mobile and head to Baldwin County or even Pensacola. American Flooring should have been our first stop.  We met Johnny Marino and shared with him what we wanted to see in our new and updated bathroom project.  He took our the contractor's proposal along with many pictures that my wife had gotten off the internet, how we wanted our new bathroom to look.  He provided us with expert advice.  He took the time to tell us what we needed.  He was more than a salesman... I considered him an expert in flooring.  We are so excited, we cannot wait until the job is completed.

name: Burchfield lc
text: Great service from picking out flooring to the install! Highly recommend! They are a locally owned company with fantastic prices, I will be back next time!

name: Sandra Mikul
text: Beautiful installation! Michael and Cliff were pleasant, efficient and we love the final product.  Glad we decided on new counters! Also, Robert gave us good advice on choosing colors while we were looking at the large inventory.  Thanks

name: Daniel Garrido
text: Amazing store to buy from, great people and service. Definitely recommend!

name: Ashley La Bounty
text: Our experiences has been amazing!!! The quality flooring and staff is amazing. Had the pleasure of working with the owner himself and he make us feel right at home every time.

name: Quintin Wilder
text: I only deliver packages to them but every time I go they always helping someone with a great attitude.

name: Stanley Self
text: Great. Carpet and pad.  Wonderful flooring.   Installers were very friendly and respectful.  Salesman was very friendly and helpful.  Very satisfied.

name: Theresa Seibert
text: American Flooring and Granite has impeccable customer service very knowledgeable on all the products.  I love the fact that they use a 15 year sealer on all the natural stones. They have a large selection to choose from. My counter tops are beautiful!

name: Richard Moore
text:
NEVER AGAIN!
This level of incompetence is unfathomable. My installer calls me up to verify directions, ten minutes later one of the employees calls me to tell me "We can't sell you this flooring" ( That the salesman practically begged us to pay for weeks earlier) Half my house is on my porch and in my yard at this point. They had their third "problem" reported two days earlier but didn't bother to call the people who had bought any of it. The sales man was an absolute joke. I don't know whos brother-in-law he is but that is the ONLY way he could keep his job!
The Installers....were AWESOME! (Sub contracted).
This is only part of the issues I had....all I can say is,
American Flooring will NEVER get another dime from me.

name: Jesse Brewer
text: We did a major  2 1/2 bathroom remodel at our home and American Flooring Cabinets & Granite did a great job! It was a pleasure working with  Jennifer who helped us pick out our porcelain tile and exotic granite.  It did not stop there she took the time to pick out the paint color that would compliment the exotic granite and porcelain tile.  The  selection of porcelain tile and granite options we viewed that day at American Flooring Cabinets & Granite was  top quality.  The workers did a top notch job.  At the completion of the job, Jennifer came out and looked over everything and made sure we were satisfied with everything.  All of our questions were answered.  Our future flooring projects will definitely be handled through American Flooring.

resp.text: Thank you, Jesse! Glad we could serve you!

name: Donna Dicken
text: My husband and I are very please with the whole experience from buying our flooring to the two gentleman who put it in. They did a fantastic job. We LOVE our new floor. We recommend American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite and will use again in the future.

name: Steven Duquette
text: I had a great experience at AFC&G from the minute I walked through the door until the minute the job was completed.  Don and Jennifer were so helpful throughout the entire process and what a selection of materials they have in the storeroom to choose from.  My granite counter tops and custom designed shower turned out like a showroom display.  Many thanks to Roland who did the design and installation.  Every measurement and cut he made was with laser precision.  I highly recommend you visit the showroom to see what they carry and talk with their very knowledgeable sales reps.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Duquette! We loved the finished product and are glad to have you as a loyal customer! If you need anything at all, you know who to call.

name: jay trammell
text: Stay away from this place. Salesman that helped me was great. Owner is crazy to work with I was giving quote and come in to store and he changed it. Very low to do. Obviously does not care about business . This 5k plus Job was going to be a 12k plus job when done so business is not his priority. Other stores did honor their quotes.  Check your options as they lost me and a lot more business because of this guy. Pathetic customer relations .

name: Forest Dixon`
text: American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite is the best place to go if you're interested in perusing some remodeling a home. We just had some new carpet installed in our house and couldn't be more pleased with the outcome! Mr. Don Williams is personable, yet professional. He gave us a fair up-front price as soon as we gave him our measurements. Ms. Jessica also helped us and she was a pleasure to work with as well. Even the installers were professional, quick and did a wonderful job. We are planning on remodeling our bathrooms with new cabinets, granite counter-tops and porcelain tile, so we know exactly where to go for our next project!

resp.text: Thank you, Forest! We appreciate your business!

name: Maggie Ainsworth
text: American Carpet did an AMAZING job on my new vinyl flooring!!! Workers were professional, punctual, and friendly. I would highly recommend them to anyone interested in new floors. Will definitely use them again!!!!

name: Mike Doggett
text: Great Selection!! This store has a TON of products. Jennifer was our salesperson and guided us every step of the way. We looked at engineered wood and solid wood flooring, but ended up getting a beautiful tile that looks exactly like a wood floor. Guests are shocked when they find out it's tile. We also got a backsplash and granite for our bar and it looks amazing. We will be going back when we get ready for cabinets.  I would recommend this company to anyone looking upgrade their home. They had a amazing selection of vinyl plank and vinyl tile that would be perfect for a bigger family on a budget.

resp.text: Thank you, Mike! Great doing business with you!

name: HM M
text: I walked in and was not greeted. I walked up to two people at desks and they didn't seem interested and couldn't seem to help even though I had a tile in my hand. They called another guy. I asked him about finding a similar size to my vintage tile because Lowe's only had 4x4. He said it would have to be measured and hesitated. He said he would see if he could find a tape measure. He came back and measured and said 4.25x4.25 and that was custom. He said I would have to buy a box but wasn't positive he knew how many tiles that was. He did a bunch of stuff on a calculator until he quoted me 100 tiles for $62. I needed 14 so I told him I would check back after searching. He told me he had the same problem when he did his bathroom. He said okay and maybe I would find an open box somewhere. I walked into Home Depot and 4.25x4.25 is a standard size. I bought 14 tiles for $2.46. I'm not sure what to say about that. I will let you come up with your own conclusions.

name: Lynn Sigouin
text:
Thank you once again for another beautiful and professional installation. Our stairs look like the center piece of our new home thanks to our wonderful Irene who gave us great customer service and always followed up with calls, Jonathon and Stephen who installed with perfection for detail and so,so polite and so talented.
And for the kind, sweet voice on the other end greeting me this morning,  Jessica who assisted all my needs.
Great team you have, Don...Jay, I am sorry to have missed you my friend but we couldn't be more pleased .
Blessings to all,
Thank you again,
Ray and Lynn Sigouin (Principe)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lynn!! We are so thankful for your business. Please let us know if you need anything else in the future!

name: Belinda Hall
text: I came to this store for cabinets.  It is going on 2 months. The are not hung. The parts of the cabinets they just ordered without ever coming to my home for any type of measurements are under my carport blocking so I can't park my car. I have called repeatedly,  people have been rude, hung up on, talked down, and still no progress!!

name: Nina Propst
text: We are very satisfied with our new carpet and with the service we received.  We recommend checking them out for all of your flooring and countertops first...it will save you lots of time and stress!  Special thanks to Don Williams.  We will be back.

name: Mendy Nilsson
text: Shannon Williams is fantastic. He listened to my needs and showed me lots of options giving the pros and cons of each type of floor. That allowed me to choose the best floor for my needs and WOW I'm so thrilled with my luxury vinyl plank flooring. So beautiful and so easy to clean it makes cleaning house fun. Thank you Shannon and American!!

name: LeBarbara Stinson
text: I had the opportunity to have my Luxury Vinyl Plank floors installed by Mr. Glenn Smith. He had his team members with him. They were the kindest men. They worked hard and didn't half step on anything! They are funny and welcoming. I would recommend them anytime. I thoroughly enjoyed them. They were professional and operated on total and complete excellence!

resp.text: Thank you, LeBarbara!! We will let Glenn know he did a great job. We appreciate your business!

name: Susan Allen
text:
Very informative, professional, and helpful!

Thanks Don Williams.

name: Lisa McGhee
text: I want to say that I won a contest with American Carpets. My prize was 250$ off any area rug in the show room. I went in yesterday to pick out my rug, and was greeted by the owner Mr. Don.. I never expected to have the experience I had with the owner and or any of the showroom employee's they were all so nice and helpful. The owner was there to help me the whole time and made it very memorable he is a very great guy.. I would never hesitate about sending someone in to get any flooring these people treated me with the up most respect and dignity as if I was a paying customer and I'll never forget that... Thanks again to all the people at American Carpets.. y'all are the best... Thanks again Mr. Don glad to have met you...

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa! It was our pleasure!

name: Mr. Curtis
text:
In the past I've remodeled homes for a living, but was never in the position to actually come out of pocket and select carpets, etc.
It turns out making the right choice is lots harder than you think! With the fierce competition now days, it's easy to be told what you want to hear, given prices that you can't judge properly, and ultimately, run around in circles ending with products that are NOT to your satisfaction.
These issues do not arise with American Flooring (the Mobile location is the one I've become acquainted with). The woman who answered my calls, Jessica, was absolutely wonderful to speak with, and the sales person she brought me to the table with, Shane, was both professional, and compassionate.
Suffice it to say I will be returning very soon!

resp.text: Thanks you, Mr. Curtis!! We look forward to hearing from you soon, and in the meantime if you have any questions at all, you know who to call!

name: t h
text: I have recently completed a kitchen renovation and love the outcome. Don helped me select the perfect quartzite countertop for the new island, we purchased luxury vinyl plank for the new floors plus found a beautiful new rug too. Thank you so much for all of your assistance! I am pleased and feel I got a great deal and great service at American Flooring. I would highly recommend them to all of my family and friends.

resp.text: Thank you!! We loved the way your kitchen turned out. Looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: candes ritter
text: I’ve had several rooms carpeted and have always received excellent service, prices and installments.  Absolutely...... this is your first stop if you need flooring!

resp.text: Thank you, Candes! We really appreciate your business!

name: Gary Stiegler
text: My wife came in with a sample and the info for the flooring which had been purchased at AC.  Johnny,  the salesman immediately let her know without looking around that they didn't carry the item.  She proceeded to look around the store on her own, no one asking if she needed help, but after 20 minutes, found the exact piece of flooring!  Found Johnny, and he gave her a price of almost $200 for a 12 piece box of vinyl flooring.  Thanks, but NO THANKS American Carpets!

name: Sally Faucheaux
text: Thank you Jennifer ..... She  was my floor and cabinet specialist..... And thank you for all your expertise,   Also want to thank every one else at  American flooring this is not  the. first time that they have done work for me.  I was very pleased in the past,   It has been some years ago I am changing now because I don't want carpet anymore I want to change to ceramic....great job then, and I am sure they will do a awesome job this time as well, after all   I came back for more ;)

name: Rachel Jenkins
text: Jennifer Vaughan is amazing to work with.   She saw my vision and brought it to life.  She also prepared me for the installation experience by explaining it honestly and in depth.   I will never use anyone else in the future except her.   American Flooring needs to hold on to her.

name: Sharon Thompson
text: I am a mortgage lender in the Mobile and Baldwin county areas and have referred more clients than I can count to the Mobile and Gulf Shores locations over the years. Whatever your home needs may be, American Flooring is well rounded with an amazing selection of products, and a wonderful team of sales reps and installers. Be sure you follow them on Facebook, they do lots of giveaways and sales you don't want to miss! If you want to call before you go in and actually schedule ahead, ask for Jessica and she'll make sure someone is there to greet you and meet whatever needs you have!

name: Jessica Bates
text: I'm only giving one star because the material itself was great. The guy that did our template for our countertops measured wrong and only half of my notch was able to be done. The installers flooded my bathroom because the water wasn't off when they took the pipes apart. They knocked several holes in my walls and left without mentioning any of them. After a SIX HOUR install, I still had no water to my sinks and only half of the kitchen done. My stuff wet and laying everywhere and holes in walls in every room they worked in.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to let us know about the situation. We are reaching out to the installation crew and will make this right for you, whatever it may take. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Update: Thank you for allowing us to fix all of the issues. We appreciate your business!!

name: Leslile Reddick
text: I used American Carpets to install my granite, carpet and laminate flooring in my kitchen.  This was done in August 2013.  My carpet separated between rooms and along the kitchen and living room and nails are sticking up.  My under counter sink is loose.  I have been trying to have this fixed for months now with no resolution at all.  Chris in installation has been out to my house twice to "look" at it with promises of it being fixed.  Nothing has been done.  I feel that the work that was done was unprofessional and cheap.  I spent a lot of money on this and would expect it to last longer than a year and if not, at least for it to be fixed in a timely manner.  I will never refer anybody to American Carpets as my experience has been very dissatisfying.  I have never written a review before, much less a negative one, but I felt I had to because I have been getting the run around for months.

name: Steve Baker
text: Very friendly folks. Not only did I get a great job on my ceramic flooring​, I think that this business has a lot of Christian people and that is why it is doing so good. Chris and his son that laid my flooring did a great job. Shane the salesman also knows his job. A plus to this business.

name: Lacy Hilliard
text: Craig Crawford and his crew did excellent on the installation of vinyl flooring. They were personable, well mannered and addressed my concerns immediately . This is the crew you need for your installation! Showroom time was quick and precise with my needs.

resp.text: Thank you, Lacy! We've let Craig know how great of a job he did. We look forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: Kem Hall
text: I googled wood floorings and came up with this store. For years I thought they only sold carpet.  I found a vast amount of everything needed for a home; granite, cabinets, wood flooring, tile, rugs, vinyl plank, you name it and its here.  This is a ONE STOP SHOP. Employees are welcoming, helpful and knowledgeable to help with everything. They have good deals too.

name: Kyla Gaston
text: I GOT THE OPPORTUNITY TO WORK WITH JENNIFER V. AND JAN R.  - OH MY GOODNESS THEY ARE A TERRIFIC TEAM. I HAD AN ISSUE WITH MY FLOOR WHEN MY HOME WAS BUILT DUE TO THE WRONG DOOR BEING PLACED IN THE HOME, MY WOOD FLOORING HAD TO COME UP DUE TO WATER DAMAGE AND I HAD TO REPLACE IT WITH ANOTHER PRODUCT. JENNIFER AND JAN SAW HOW UPSET I WAS AND WAS ABLE TO MAKE FEEL BETTER AND REASSURED ME THE SECTION OF MY FLOOR WOULD LOOK FABULOUS. I AM SO HAPPY WITH THE TILE AND MOSIAC ACCENT TILE FOR THE FLOOR AREA, IT LOOKS LIKE THE HOME WAS ORGINALLY BUILT THAT WAY. I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH FOR JENNIFER AND JAN TWO WONDERFUL LADIES AND THEY ARE GREAT AT THEIR JOBS.

resp.text: Thank you for your business, Kyla!!

name: Ethel Moore
text: My husband and I received a warm welcome upon entering the storefront and we were treated wonderfully! I explained to Shannon,  our sales rep,  what I wanted and he took us right to it!  It felt as if we were old friends.  I was never pressured to purchase anything which is a PLUS.  I cannot count the many times that I left a place due to the pressure to buy something that I'm really not looking for.  We also met the 'big man in charge' -as I affectionately refer to him.  You know,  the 'open 8 to 8 so don't be late' gentleman.  Lol.  Very warm and professional.  The carpet they installed looks AMAZING!  It's exactly what I wanted at the price I wanted! I will DEFINITELY recommend American Flooring and Cabinets. Ask for Shannon,  HE IS A GEM!

name: Lynn Zimmerman
text: We had Johnny also five years ago and are sorry we went there. We asked for the best pad that they had and also wanted quality carpet and were told that we had ordered it. Now we have "humps" in our carpet from stretching and we have to replace it soon. They tiled our foyer, hall and kitchen and while we love the tile they are uneven and chipped. Afterwards they fixed some but in order to make it right they would have had to redo most of it.  For $6,000+ we just expected better.  Make sure that you know what you are getting is right and the quality that you expect. We went to the Mobile store to have our work done.

name: AllDone3
text:
Not only did they sell me on buying material from them instead of the competitors in the are, they educated me on WHY was more durable or waterproof than another and explained the difference in the products that I was interested in.

"People buy from people, not companies."

These people took fantastic care of me and my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Aldon! We look forward to doing more business with you in the future!

name: Katie Azevedo
text: We love our new carpet! The prices were reasonable and everything was done quickly and professionally.

name: Mallory Howard
text: So, my impression was great when I left the store but quickly changed. Salesmen were very helpful. Acted eager to help us get our remodel done. They showed me a countertop that they had in stock. It was ok, but not exactly when I was looking for but they insisted it looked great. I again, said no, I’ll keep looking. Kept looking and found the one, the countertop that would look the best. Left the store with the salesman’s card to call back with measurements. My husband called them 2 hours later to get a quote. Salesman tried selling him the countertop they had in stock but was not what I looking for. My husband told him no, she wants the other. He quoted him a price. Then called back and DOUBLED the the first quote because they’d have to order it. Seems they were eager to help sell what they had in stock, but be darned to sell what they’d have to order. We won’t be making a purchase from this store. Our business will go else where.

name: Scotti Bee
text: Great place. Everyone I worked with was fantastic. Great attitudes, wonderful customer service.

name: Apple Henderson
text: Well..well well, what can I say??  I sought help and met a man named Johnny at American.  We were needing granite and flooring.  He showed us a couple of choices and suggested we go to the warehouse in Loxley to pick granite and took our info and said  let him know what we decide on and we'll get a quote.  Needless to say he lost our info and forgot who we were.  We contacted him and reminded him of the quote.  He was to get with us on several occasions and did not!!  The lady who answered my call was aware of my frustration and got a owner/manager to take my call.  Got another we'll get you the answer and call you spill again.  We are not from here and should have believed reviews...SOOOO grateful to have been referred to HARD ROCK GRANITE....they are professional, personable,  thorough, quick and they treat you like family. If quality everything choose HARD ROCK they will be honest and get you a better deal too!!!!!

resp.text:
April,

I am so sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience. We really appreciate your feedback, and hope that in the future you give us the chance to make it right.

name: Logan Crouch
text:
I came in with a friend and Johnny Marino was our salesmen. I have never had a worse experience. He was introduced to us as 'the man who knew it best' and that he had 'been in the business for 43 years'. However, he was not polite, seemed to talk over us as we explained our needs, treated us as if we had no idea what we wanted, and overall was completely unprofessional: not only to us, but for other customers who were in the store. We were shown one product, and after the purchase, were shown a completely different colored product; then were argued to repeatedly that it was the light causing the color difference.

The business had a wide selection of products, and I'm sure with another salesman we would have had a better experience. But this particular transaction just left a bad taste in my mouth.

name: Joshua Carper
text: Dont shop here they are crooks!

name: Victoria Wilson
text: Advertised "Open 8 to 8". Arrived about 5:40 unaware of new store hours. Came to buy flooring for 3 rooms. Salesman took me to the back to look at sheet vinyl rolls and remnants. Told me to browse while he figured out how much I needed from the measurements that I provided. I thought he was taking a little too long. Went to look for him and discovered that everyone had left and locked the doors. That's when I saw a sheet of white paper on the front door with new store hours 8-6. I HAD A PANIC ATTACK! Called my sister. She called Mobile Police Dept. MPD came. A woman in another vehicle then arrived and told him how to get me out. I left a note on the salesman's desk with my name and phone number and what had happened. I picked up my floor plan and measurements and left. NO ONE EVEN CALLED TO APOLOGIZE.

name: Michael A
text: Service was excellent. Shane Gros was very helpful. Definitely the place to shop. Can't go wrong. Thank you Shane for all your help!

name: Todd Burley
text: Visited this place on April 2nd to shop for new carpeting for our new house in Semmes. After we shopped around at several stores we found this place the most useful because of their helpful staff, affordable prices and financing. We ended up buying 1500 sq ft of carpet and had it installed last week, my wife loves the carpet and I love being able to get out of bed barefoot. We are very happy with American Flooring and would recommend them to anyone who needs a good deal on carpet

name: Cyndi Booth
text: I love, love, love my new kitchen granite countertops. They look great with the new cabinets recently installed by American Flooring, Cabinets , and Granite . I had the tile floors installed in a few rooms about 6 months ago. Everything is coming together and looking beautiful! Next is the bathroom shower and countertops and a bedroom needs hardwood flooring and........American Flooring, Cabinets, & Granite "Your One Stop Shop" for all of your remodeling needs!

name: John rohman
text: They have a beautiful showroom and staff was very helpful it was a great experience no stress,ill be back

resp.text: Thanks, John! We are looking forward to it!

name: Danny Woodard
text: Attended the event they had last week where they said they were giving away prizes. I was told by a young lady there the drawings wouldn't be until late that evening and that I had to buy something to get a ticket. I then decided to buy a bottle of cleaner and was told that wasn't enough value for a ticket into the drawing. Clearly a bait and switch tactic to get people in their expensive store. Buyers Beware!

resp.text: No purchase was necessary to enter the contest or win. In fact, 4 out of 5 of our big prize winners didn't shop with us that day. We did not find this customer in our database of transactions that day. We appreciate all of our customers who came in for our 45th anniversary customer appreciation day event and hope to continue being your one stop shop!

name: Diane james
text: LOVE my new rugs! Will definitely be doing business with y'all in the future!

resp.text: Looking forward to it! Thanks!

name: Norma Beachman
text:
We got everything we asked for .the company is number 5 you
And their employment Ronald STEGMEIER is So Good At his Job
iWould Give Him A 10
He made Sure the Job was done Right And worked untill it was Finished
On A Saturday we would Recommend your Company and  Employee
Ronald STEGMEIER to anyone.
Robert and Norma BEACHMAN

resp.text: Thank you, Norma!! We appreciate your business and I believe you meant Roland? We will let Roland know of his stellar job!

name: val hansen
text: When you place an order for 14 boxes for laminate flooring and get 3 boxes you think maybe it was just 1 mistake.  When you also place an order for ceramic tile for the facing of your fireplace at the same time you ordered the laminate flooring and you get 3/4 of it you start to wonder about this store that's been in business for so long. When you place an order for 3 boxes of ceramic tile for the inside of your fireplace at that very same time and you get 1 box because they FORGOT to order 3 and  you have PAID for it ALL!!!!  I am wondering WTH is THEIR problem!!!!  I took back the 1 box of ceramic tile since I didn't like it,  it didn't match, got a refund, pkd up the 3 boxes of flooring and tried to give me the other 2 boxes of ceramic tile I had gotten a refund on?????  Yes, I know had for me to believe too!!  Finally got all of my flooring. Had to reorder more fireplace facing tiles, pd for it, was told it was ordered as I was in the store and would be in that Friday, it came in the next Tuesday!!!! Found out it was NOT ordered until the day AFTER I ordered it!!!!  BTW, I finally went to LOWES, and got the rest of the ceramic tile I needed for the inside of my fireplace that they had IN STOCK!!  All this going on as my contractor was doing what he could with what we had!!!  Needless to say HE was not very happy and will be writing a review also on this store.  I live 18 miles 1 way from this Mobile store.  I made a trip 6 days in a row.  My sales person was Shane Williams.  I would NEVER recommend this store to anyone and will tell everyone I know of my experience.

name: J H
text: Misleading sales. If they make a mistake you are stuck with it...no returns! I tell everyone not to shop here. Salesman called me "sweetie" when he refused to correct his mistake..how demeaning. Similar incident with an acquaintance of mine, so must not be a rare occurrence.

name: Leigh Stewart
text: Don has always help us in anyway that he can.  If I ever had a problem,  Don take care of it himself. We have been with him for many, many years.

name: Hannah Saenz
text: This is most definitely a one stop shop, bought my counter tops, cabinets and flooring here. The prices were very affordable and I highly recommend this place to everyone!

name: Jonathan Cunningham
text: Good place friendly service

name: Jason Pyon
text: Great people, great floors!

resp.text: Thank you, Jason!

name: jessie james
text: Awesome Customer Service!!!!!!

name: Tiffany Middleton
text: Great customer service

resp.text: Thank you, Tiffany. We appreciate your business!

name: Kyle Patterson
text: Very good experience

resp.text: Thanks, Kyle! Who was your sales rep?

name: Michael Farrier
text: Helpful

resp.text: Thank you, Michael!

name: Joshua Southard
text: They are very nice and extremely helpful to the extent of looking at pictures of the wall color and getting a good match for the floor and not clash. They have everything you need to get a floor done with real hardwood, laminate hardwood, vinyl and tile carpets and rugs. If u can walk on it THEY will have it. I'm still waiting on the free home estimate and I will update this post after with pictures.

name: Traci Reed
text: What a wonderful experience today at this establishment working with Kim! It was so refreshing to work with her and Dinah!! And we got Everything we wanted and needed. We love All we picked out!! Can’t wait to see it all in our New Forever Home!!!!

name: Mike Measels
text: Shane and David did great. They were committed to and take great pride in their job. They were punctual every day and if they were going to be a little late would notify us. They have the process of refinishing floors down to a science and a lot of hard work.  They were also courteous and friendly.  We highly recommend them.

name: Merri Bass
text: Staff is the best!! Helpful and very knowledgeable about all things flooring.

name: Steven Stovall
text: Very nice and willing to answer all your questions Good people

name: Jacques Cockrell
text: Great experience. Very professional and knowledgeable. Nice selections and great attitudes.

name: Balinda Adams
text: This place has just the right amount of a variety of flooring without making you overwhelmed. The young guy at the desk was very nice and attentive to us when we came in. Shane went out of his way to make sure my parents found everything they were looking for. He even gave them a sample of wood to take home to see if it matched the staircase. He also gave them a quote that was much cheaper than the other flooring store we had went to. He was honest and very upfront. If you go by, ask for Shane and he will take great care of you and even help with design questions.

name: Adam Baker
text: We were pleasantly surprised when we walked in the door! Not only did everyone greet us but several were busy with other customers yet they made sure we were taken care of. We told Vicki what we wanted and she read my mind and presented several options. We will not only mention them to our friends we will shop with them again very soon. Thank you for your hospitality and commitment to making sure we got what we wanted, in the budget we had to work with and all installed in a timely manner.

name: T W
text: Update to a review with only 1 star rating several months ago from De W. As the customer who wrote it, we made an effort to update the rating but could not seem to do so. However, please know that all concerns with the installer were addressed and done so professionally. In reality the concern was simply a breakdown in communication. No one is perfect and they did what was right and corrected our concerns. Ryan was excellent and prides himself on taking care of the customer. Please omit the rating from your decision process on where to buy your flooring. They truly deserve a full 5 star rating.

name: Vicky Brown
text:
Very Helpful and Knowledgeable Staff.
Great Selection to choose from... well
laid out showroom.  I would Recommend
to others.

name: Judy Croft
text: Our overall experience was outstanding, from the selection to the service. Thank you for your design advice, it really helped us make the right selection for our project. I would recommend to everyone. Thank you.

name: De W.
text:
They promise you ethical treatment, integrity & flawless service. Don't believe it.
Once carpet was selected - salesman assured quality professional installers in a timely manner.
The installer arrived late; talking highly of himself and did not reply or respond when asked questions. Once carpet installed, we inspected job. Carpet had high strips where Sean's were like the carpet was doubled at the seam. I pointed it out to installer (Terry), and he pulled on it saying it won't come loose. I said I wasn't worried about it coming loose but the seam was obviously thick.
He ignored my concern. A week later I called back and spoke to sales person who came our days later to look at it. It took another week to get a call back where salesman asked for a convenient time for installer to come back. I gave him 2-days and timetable around my work schedule. Salesman said he would call installer and get back with me on day & time. I was assured installer would be back to repair on one of the days I provided but he would call back to confirm.
On the day installer was suppose to be here for repair I received a call from installer saying he was calling to set up the appointment. What?! You were were suppose to be here....
I called the store and I got excuses from the lady sales person saying the installer was trying to call me.
Don't bother calling these people..they don't know what they're doing and they are not customer service conscious. I won't be using them again.

name: J Bin8148
text: Price I was quoted for materials changed drastically after work was done. I was told those were the in stock prices. Had no choice but to pay I was never contacted saying the quote was going to be different. Stay away

name: Catrina J
text:
No customer service. My husband and I visit the store this morning looking to purchase some flooring. When we entered, no one greeted us or said one word to us while we were there. We looked around and nothing. Waited near the desk, nothing. We left! If you are with a customer or busy, all it takes is 10 seconds to say "Hello! welcome! We will be with you shortly"
We spent our money elsewhere.

name: Lillian Black
text: Very happy with experience from sales to fantastic installers. Price exactly what estimate was.

name: Mark G.
text: We bought our flooring from Alabama Custom Flooring  and Design and couldn't ask for a better experience.  The service was beyond my expectations.  I highly recommend them for all you flooring needs.

name: Jared Toone
text: Great selection and pricing. Order came in quickly and all went well.

name: michael joseph
text: easy experience. helpful/knowledgeable sales person

name: Michelle Hockersmith
text: Thank you to Ryan for the excellent service.   I highly recommend Alabama Custom Flooring & Design for all your flooring needs.

name: Stan D
text: They quote cheap prices by the foot, and then over measure by nearly 20%...be careful with this place.

name: Dana Lee
text: Great place to find flooring.

name: Sunny Chung
text: Absolutely LOVE my new countertop installed by Alabama Stoneworks. Cody and his associate came and installed it quickly and beautifully. Didn’t damage a single thing in my kitchen and was extremely respectful. Gave me good ideas of how to grout the gap left between the new countertop and the existing wall tile because i opted not to have them put the silicone caulk. I highly recommend this company. From the moment I contacted them to final installation it was smooth. There was one small issue with the faucet hose being pinched by the sink but they came right out and fixed it immediately.

name: Tint Pro
text: Glenda and David run an absolute top notch company! From the first phone call to the final wipe down they executed the best customer service. The entire team did a great job measuring, cutting, installing, and we absolutely love our new counters. I highly recommend this business!

name: Cherie Fancher
text:
Awesome people! Clear communication all the way
Everyone was courteous from sale to installation. Quality materials and service. The countertop looks great

name: John Gill
text: Super easy to work with, Glenda goes above and beyond to get your stone selection and details of fabrication the way you want. When the stone I wanted was out of stock with the local wholesalers, she tracked it down in New Orleans. When I came back with some extra pieces to make after the kitchen was in, they were immediately on top of it, I didn’t feel like I went to the back of the queue. Price was very competitive

name: palmer3acr
text: My wife and I used ASW for our countertops in our old home a few years ago. Great work at fair prices. Recently our auto repair shop (Green Garage) needed a flat surface to resurface a cylinder head from a vintage BMW we didn't trust giving to anyone else. ASW generously gave us a piece of scrap stone and even helped me load it in my car. They refused payment and only wanted referrals in return. Great people all the way around. Use them! Thank y'all again!

name: Steve Baccus
text: These are terrific folks. We went with the granite they suggested would go well with our cherry kitchen cabinetry and it is perfect! There was only a one week turnaround from when they removed the old counter tops, to the measuring of the template and then installation. There was a problem around the sink after installation, but I contacted them and they came back out the same day of installation and fixed it. All around great experience. My wife is very happy, so I am happy!

name: LaRinda Green
text: Glenda was wonderful from start to finish.   Due to covid, they were only seeing people by appointment but on the day I called she told me if I had measurements, she could email me a quote.  From that day, to the install on today,  it was a smooth process.  The installers were great at answering any questions I had and were so polite to the whole family.  Thank you ASW,  I am so happy.

name: R. Cherri Pitts
text: As an architect and builder, I’ve worked on many projects with them  from basic countertops to highly custom projects. They are are my go to crew. We just finished a project that they fabricated a floating marble sink with a sliver of a slot drain that makes everyone stop in their tracks to study it-even the building inspector!!! They are great people, and I highly recommend them!

name: Martha Pickrell
text: The staff was very helpful and knowledgeable.  I highly recommend them for your countertop needs.

resp.text: Hi Martha! Thank you for your kind words and support. We loved getting to assist you and create your dream countertops! Please let us know if you need anything in the future!

name: Esther Smith
text: Excellent company to work with. Did a very professional job. Employees made sure everything was done properly and customer was satisfied. Recommend them highly!

resp.text: Thank you Esther! We loved getting to work with you and make your dreams into a reality! We hope you love your countertops as much as we did!! Please let us know if you ever need assistance in the future.

name: Jason Polancich
text: These folks have been great about helping us get our new kitchen done. They showed up, did professional work and are courteous and polite. They;'e even doing their best to speed up the delivery so we can finally stop eating out. Highly recommend if you want expert service,

resp.text: Hi Jason! We are so excited that you love your kitchen as much as we do! You were such a pleasure to work with and please let us know if there is ever anything you need in the future. Best wishes to you and your family!

name: Robin Katona
text: Purchased River White granite to update my kitchen. Crystal helped me pick out a tile to do the backsplash and it is BEAUTIFUL. Everyone was helpful and install was painless. Very happy with counters and backsplash

resp.text: Hi Robin! Thank you for your review. We absolutely loved getting to work with you and help create a beautiful kitchen. Hope to see you soon!

name: Adam Beams
text: J and L always does an amazing job.  They are competitive with pricing and they show up when they say they are!

resp.text: Adam, thank you for all of your support. We really appreciate it!

name: Matt Cook
text: One of the gems in Tuscaloosa for home remodeling. J&L crew deliver on what they promise. Very professional and friendly staff. Will most definitely work with them again in the future.

resp.text: Hi Matt! Thank you so much for the kind review. We enjoyed working with you and are so happy you love your countertops!! Please let us know if there is ever anything we can help with in the future!

name: Pat Roberts
text: J & L always provides superior service and a friendly environment.

resp.text: Thank you Pat for your kind words!

name: Teresa MacDonald
text: I love my new countertops! Thank you so much to everyone at Executive Granite for making this such a great experience🙂🙂

name: Sylvia Elizabeth
text: These people at this company are all wonderful!

name: Sherri House
text: These guys are amazing. They do great work and their customer service is outstanding!

name: Beth Trawick
text: Superior stone was wonderful to work with. Kayleigh was quick to respond to my questions and bring me samples to look at. They worked with us to have our flooring installed on the exact days we wanted it. Their product was top notch at a very reasonable price. Gavin and Shane who were the installers went above and beyond to give great service. They were quick, professional, and very skilled in their trade. I will definitely use Superior Stone for any future flooring needs and would recommend them without reservation to anyone who needs floor covering in our area. Awesome company!

name: Windham Pittman
text:
Holley did an outstanding job!
I wasn't even there for the job, she took complete control, from start to finish..very trustworthy!
Highly recommend!!

name: christina addy
text: Superior Stone was fantastic to work with! They were patient with us as we borrowed numerous samples to match paint and styles for our home. Made great recommendations for cuts styles. They were fairly priced and turned out a phenomenal product. Thanks again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review! We appreciate all our customers.

name: Priscilla Mead
text: We had a beautiful piece of granite installed on a kitchen island. The installation was quick and beautifully done.

name: Mark Stone
text: Good pricing but it was hard getting scheduled for the job because of being behind on other jobs. Responses to text and e-mails were slow. Finally got job done and granite countertops look nice but glue failed at one of the seams a couple months later. Finally just end up gluing it back myself after failed attempts to fit the problem  into their current schedule.

name: Danleigh Stinner
text: I have worked with Superior Stone Company on numerous occasions, and each time they have been amazing! Very professional each time, pay attention to detail, and constantly keeping me in the loop on what’s going on. I am 100% a total perfectionist and I will nit pick everything, and each time the installers (we have had a few, because we have had a few jobs done at different times and locations) have been awesome! The girls who work the store are also just as great as the installers. I would recommend them to ANYONE!

name: Stacie Diaz
text: Purchase some countertops and they are stunning.  Without  actually  picking  out a style  Holly sent me some pictures and made a recommendation. It is everything I wanted. The guys we Extremely skilled  and fast with the install.

name: Donna Dew
text: Great customer service!

name: Kassi
text: Very pleased with the service and quality of my purchase.  Customer service was exceptional Ms. Kalli went above & beyond and was able to answer all of my questions. The turn around time was also great. I'll definitely be coming back for more and I highly recommend this company.

name: Amanda Zorn
text: We had our bathroom countertops replaced with granite. Superior Stone was fast, friendly, and did a beautiful job. They have SO much to choose from, and were super knowledgeable and helpful. Working with this company was a breeze. If you are looking for granite, flooring, or cabinetry, they will not steer you wrong. Thank you Superior Stone for my beautiful bathrooms!

name: Kim Watson
text: We purchased flooring from Superior Stone Company for our entire house and it is gorgeous.  The knowledge, friendliness and service is hands down the best. We will be recommending them to all of our friends and family.  Thank you again for a wonderful experience.

name: Brooke Cavanaugh
text: Replaced bathroom counters with quartz and it looks amazing!  Super easy process - if you've been thinking of upgrading for years like me - give them a call - you won't be disappointed!

name: Corinne Giles
text: Called to see if they had any Cynclips to use on my dropped kitchen sink and the man said they didn't use those, rather they drilled holes on the backside of the Granite when cutting.  (Which is the right way to do it, I have read.). He then gave me a several suggestions on how to fix the problem without buying the clips.  I was so appreciative since my husband is trying to tackle the issue instead of paying for someone to do it.  I will be contacting Surface One in the future to install bathroom countertops.

resp.text: Thank you, Corinne Giles! We appreciate that you took the time to post this review and we look forward to working with you on those bathroom tops. S1

name: Alicia Hale
text: Totally Satisfied!  Surface One in Pelham installed quartz countertops for us and we are so happy with the finished product.  Ryan helped us pick out the perfect countertops based on what we were looking for.  They were professional from the time we shopped until everything was done.  We went to several places for quotes and Surface One was cheaper than the others.

name: Melissa
text: Nice on phone but if you don't have a big project then don't bother. Drive 45 min for them not to help and not care.

name: Stuart Nicholson
text: We are very happy with the service and the counters that we received from Surface One. Everyone we dealt with was very happy and they went out of their way to get the material we preferred. Bruce, Tebra, Cheryl, and Mary Margaret answered any questions we had and made sure we got what we wanted. Brent, who measured the kitchen, was very knowledgeable and explained the whole fabrication and installation process. Thank you to everyone!

name: Dawn Calvert
text: Great selection of material to choose from.  Great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you, Dawn. We appreciate your review and your business!

name: Kevin McPherson
text: These guys are the best I have seen in the Birmingham area!  Otstanding customer service, great products, quality installations from a top notch, very professional solid surface company!!

name: Larry Wyatt
text: We stopped in to get prices for a kitchen counter top remodel. Sales person not very knowledgeable and did not offer us a price while we were there. Told us she would email quote "within the hour" well it has been almost 2 weeks, and no quote. If you can not provide pricing when promised I sure will not trust you to provide materials. We will not be purchasing here

name: james
text: Awesome selection of granite and solid surface and very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Very experienced fabricators and installers.

name: Liz Burton
text:
This company was subcontracted by my kitchen remodel company to provide granite countertops.  First issue is that they will not come measure 'after hours' so we had to take off work to be available.  The job required 4 pieces of granite, one to be joined.  Again we were asked to take off work to come view the work particularly the joint.  They had equipment in front of one of the pieces, so we missed the fact that this piece was too short on the end.  The sealer from counter to cabinet even showed.
We complained thru the contractor and Surface One gave them a heard time about  replacing it.  After weeks of waiting they sent two workers out and again the piece was too short.  After that, they finally sent someone out to measure again.  A third piece was sent out after 9 or so weeks and this piece finally fit.  Not only were we put out because of lost of time in the kitchen, but the installer with the third piece was the original installer and he told us he told the Source One owner that he knew we would not be happy with the first piece.  So this is the kind of shoddy work they try to get away with.  Not to mention the lack of cooperation with my contractor to work out the issue.  I would not recommend them.

name: Brenda Lynn
text: Great customer service. Very professional.

name: David Hunt
text: Good job!

name: James Lamar
text: I had granite countertops installed in my kitchen along with the backsplash about two years ago and have not been happy since. The granite has a lot of pits in it and the carpetland salesman said that was normal, I’m sure it’s not. The backsplash was installed and cut to go around power outlets which we could have moved up if we had been asked to. I wasn’t home when the backsplash was installed so I had no input in it. They also dinged up several walls and again was told that’s normal. I did not push the issue since I was already told that the granite pitting was normal. I was going to go over there and talk to management, but Covid struck and didn’t get to. I live about 45 - 60 minutes from the store. Every time I go in my kitchen I am disappointed in the work they did. I’m sure after two years they will probably do nothing about it. I have learned my lesson!

resp.text: Mr. Lamar,  we are as disappointed as you are when we receive this type of review.  It has been brought to the attention of management and and ownership for review.  In the meantime, please don't hesitate to call us at 334-793-1004.  Thank you.

name: Sara Braswell
text: I had a great experience with Carpetland! Thank you Tami Johnson for helping me pick out the perfect carpet that I needed. Kind, courteous and knowledgeable. The installers did a great job... Reid, his wife and Dean. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you!  Your business is appreciated.

name: Gina Medley
text:
My experience with Carpetland in Dothan has been incredibly smooth. The craftsmanship is awesome. The customer service is top notch!  Everyone has been a pleasure to work with making out building process go seamlessly.
I can’t say enough about the team of professional craftsman- thorough and detailed. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! We appreciate your kind words and putting your trust in us.

name: Debra Riley
text: Can't wait to get the new carpet in.  Everyone was so helpful.   I'll be doing more bussiness there.

name: Darlene Hicks
text: My husband and I decided to do some updating to our home. I went in to Carpetland and told Tami what we had in mind. After listening to us, she went and pulled samples of tiles, flooring and granite and it was exactly what we had in mind. She led us each step of the way. Ricardo was sent to put the floors down and was so meticulous. The finished product was beautiful. Terry (and wife- sorry I forgot her name) put tile in the kitchen and did a great job.  Next, the bathroom, and can’t wait to see it completed.

name: Julia Moore
text: Michelle was an amazing asset while we were building our forever home. She made a stressful process so easy! She always kept me up to date on everything. She always had a smile on her face and positive attitude; regardless of what was going on. She's amazing and I can't thank her enough for all the help she gave us during the building process.

name: Richetta Worlds
text: Terrible service!!! The customer service representative is very rude and unprofessional. I have worked in customer service for a long time and I quite honestly dont know how this company still exist. They never return phone calls. I tried to make a complaint about some flooring tile that was installed and all they gave me was excuses and never tried to resolve my problem. Even if they were not going to do a single thing to help me at least have the decency to follow up with a phone call. I spent over 8,000.00 in flooing at this store and they treated me like trash after I spent my money with them. Do not use this company,  they are GARBAGE!!

resp.text:
Mrs. Worlds,
In a situation such as this, we’ll send a manager to inspect the issue and to determine a resolution. If the issue is still unresolved we forward your complaint to the manufacturer’s representatives and ask for their recommendation.  In this case both Carpetland’s management and the manufacturer agreed that the stain resistance in your specific carpet will not withstand the traffic in the area where it was installed. If you wish to consider an option presented to you, please contact Carpetland USA’s retail sales manager.

name: Mrs. Suarez
text: IMO best flooring and granite store around

resp.text: Thank you so much!!  We appreciate you putting your trust in us :-)

name: Mikael Ash
text: Sales Representative Cindy was truly outstanding...keeping us in our budget while meeting our needs

resp.text: Thank you very much! We appreciate you and your trust in our company!!

name: Trina Turk
text:
Carpetland USA in Dothan is a beautiful place to shop. I went in looking for carpet and Michelle waited on me. She was very sweet and attentive to the kind of carpet I was looking for. We didn't purchase that day, I wanted to talk it over with my husband. Michelle stayed in touch with me. She called me to let me know of a secret sale they were having. It was a great sale. Too great to pass up. Needless to say, I purchased the carpet I wanted at a GREAT price and it was installed before Thanksgiving like I had requested.
The two men who did the install did a fantastic job! They cleaned up and vacuumed all the rooms before they left. I will definitely be purchasing from Carpetland USA in Dothan for my future flooring and remodeling!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great Five Star review!!

name: Reed York
text: We started with this company when was had are floors install. They did a fantastic job with the floor and Cindy has been wonderful. We decided to have carpet land do are countertops. They called us last week and told us it was going to be installed today on the 24th. They never showed up and now they are saying that my wife is lying about the install date. Now I don't know when it will are ever get installed. I was standing next to her when they called and my wife asked me if Wednesday the 24th would be ok and I said that would be fine. I have other work going on in the house so I moved everything to the garage to get it out of the way. I have a bad back and a bad knee and it is very hard for me to get around. I guess we will have to see if they ever show up. Cindy is a great person to work with but I can't say much for the rest of the people who work there.

name: Maddie Sykes
text: Absolutely fantastic company! Their materials and products are beautiful and customer service is always friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend!

name: Susan Jones
text: My experience was terrible with the sales rep. The Tile Installer (Olan)that actually put the tile into two of our showers was AWESOME!!  If you could possibly  get that installer  I might would recommend them but the service was terrible with the  sales rep that we were offered.

name: Trey Maker
text: Be careful if you do business here. I had something taken from my house during installation of my floors. Scary that you can't trust people you are keeping employed!!

resp.text: Mr. Maker... I am sorry that you have had a bad experience with  a Carpetland, but I don't believe that this was our Carpetland in Dothan, Al.   We have great employees and our installers are sub contractors and they two are fabulous as well!!

name: Jules Goodman
text: Staff not helpful, did not have time for me

name: Lori Rainbolt
text: Great selection and design advice was spot on!
